user_description.ru: Незаметные прикосновения в публичном месте. Рука под столом.
user_description.en: Secret touches in public. Hand under table.

ai_description.ru: Незаметно трогать партнёра в публичном месте. Рука под столом в ресторане, в толпе, в кино. Возбуждение от риска и тайны.
ai_description.en: Secretly touching partner in public. Hand under the table at restaurant, in a crowd, at the movies. Arousal from risk and secrecy.

image_prompt: couple at restaurant table, his hand under tablecloth touching her thigh, she tries to maintain composure, other diners blurred in background, intimate secret moment
